amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language establishing a judicial review process with regard to agency compliance with the risk assessment requirements of the bill; and specify that nothing in the bill should be construed as creating any additional right to judicial or administrative review.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike the provisions of the bill establishing a judicial review process with regard to agency compliance with the risk assessment requirements of the bill. The amendment would specify that nothing in the bill should be construed as creating any additional right to judicial or administrative review.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roemer amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 231 (Roll no. 177).
